description: '''We Are the Fallen''' is an American-Irish [[hard rock]] band formed in 2009, comprising Irish singer and former ''[[American Idol]]'' contestant [[Carly Smithson]], guitarists [[Ben Moody]] and [[John LeCompt]], drummer [[Rocky Gray]], and bassist [[Marty O'Brien]]. Moody, LeCompt, and Gray were previously members of the American rock band [[Evanescence]]. The band released their debut album, ''[[Tear the World Down]]'', in May 2010. Their final performance occurred in January 2011, and the band has been inactive since.
